description.value:
A Device attached to a sturdy backpack or held in one hand. When activatedw ith a Half Action all sound within 10m x Character's Willpower Bonus is silenced, damage from Sonic weapons is halved. Those not Slaanesh Aligned must make +10 Willpower Test each turn or suffer -10 to all tests from the disconcerting silence.

Requirements

Must be Dedicated to Slaanesh to use. Heretical The Silence doesn't help Stealth Tests as the field creates a lot of light at its edge.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
